item.title: Sign the petition! Former Black Panther Jalil Muntaqim was...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Sign the petition! Former Black Panther Jalil Muntaqim was arrested Friday and is facing re-imprisonment for filling out a voter registration form. Jalil was just released last month after being unjustly imprisoned for 49 years.

The carceral state is relentless. After 49 years caged, Jalil Muntaqim’s freedom is in jeopardy after completing a voter registration form. Mr. Muntaqim's family and community who know, honor and love their educated, respected and courageous elder, say NO!

sfbayview.com

Jalil Muntaqim, recently paroled after 49 years, was arrested Friday and is facing re-imprisonment for completing a voter registration form

The carceral state is relentless. After 49 years caged, Jalil Muntaqim’s freedom is in jeopardy after completing a voter registration form. Mr. Muntaqim's family and community who know, honor and love their educated, respected and courageous elder, say NO!The carceral state is relentless. After 49 years caged, Jalil Muntaqim’s freedom is in jeopardy after completing a voter registration form. Mr. Muntaqim's family and community who know, honor and love their educated, respected and courageous elder, say NO!

item.title: A highly recommended read on the systematic dismantling of our...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

A highly recommended read on the systematic dismantling of our First Amendment rights, highlighting the case in Denver

“What the states are doing,” veteran civil rights attorney Mara Verheyden-Hilliard says, “is signaling to people that they are risking life and limb if they join a peaceful protest, that they are risking decades in jail, that they’re risking bankrupting fines, just because they want to go out and, in common cause with other people, demonstrate or protest.”

Our First Amendment right has been systematically dismantled — just when we might need it most

gen.medium.com

How the Government Is Accelerating Its War On the Right to Protest

Our First Amendment right has been systematically dismantled — just when we might need it mostOur First Amendment right has been systematically dismantled — just when we might need it most

item.title: Spotted in Denver! #LaRiva2020 #VoteSocialist Small businesses...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Spotted in Denver! #LaRiva2020 #VoteSocialist

Small businesses are struggling to stay afloat during this pandemic, and neither capitalist candidate is offering the kind of expansive relief program that will actually get people through this crisis. Gloria La Riva and the PSL are fighting for the things that working people in this country need: rent and mortgage cancellation, mass covid-testing, guaranteed income during the pandemic, free healthcare for all.

#VoteSocialist2020 ...and join us in the fight beyond the elections to advance the interests of working and oppressed people in this country.

If you want a Gloria La Riva 2020 yard sign, call 720-530-9167.

See MoreVisit the Voting Information Center for official election resources and local updates. Get Voting Information

item.title: Today is Joel’s birthday! 🎉🎉 What could be a better gift...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Today is Joel’s birthday! 🎉🎉 What could be a better gift than to help make sure he and the comrades stay free? Joel is facing 23 charges in retaliation for his leadership in the movement for #JusticeforElijahMcClain, including 11 felonies, which could carry a sentence of decades in prison.

Donate to the legal and political support fund at pslweb.org/donate4denver or on Venmo @donate4denver.
item.author: Party for Socialism and Liberation

item.title: Yesterday afternoon in West Philadelphia, 27-year-old Walter...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Yesterday afternoon in West Philadelphia, 27-year-old Walter Wallace Jr. was murdered by Philadelphia police in front of his parents. Protestors, including PSL members, gathered last night near the scene in Cobbs Creek while police barricaded entire sections of West Philadelphia. There is a mass action planned for tonight at Malcom X Park in Philly.

The people will continue the struggle until white supremacist police terror ends!

Justice for Walter Wallace Jr!
item.author: Party for Socialism and Liberation

item.title: Amy Coney Barrett, an arch-reactionary, anti-LGBTQ,...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Amy Coney Barrett, an arch-reactionary, anti-LGBTQ, anti-abortion bigot, has been confirmed to the Supreme Court, solidifying the extreme right-wing majority of the court.

Democrats approved Barrett without a fight in less than three months, just a week before a presidential election. Biden said Barrett was "a very fine person" and that he was "not opposed" to her nomination. The Democratic party has once again demonstrated that it does not intend to mount any real oppositio...n to reactionaries and their policies.

In truth, the Supreme Court has been one of the most consistently reactionary institutions of the United States. The Supreme Court exists to limit the democratic process in the interests of the ruling class. It ensures, for example, that no democratically elected Congress could ever pass a law that infringes on the right of the rich to own their wealth. We recommend reading "The Supreme Court: last line of defense for the ruling class" (linked in comments) for more analysis of the class character of the Supreme Court.

The system we live under does not offer real democracy to working and oppressed people. We need a system in which our interests are actually represented in our government. This is why we fight for socialism.

See More
item.author: Party for Socialism and Liberation

item.title: #Listenhere Denver PSL organizer Ryan speaks on the Leaflets...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

#Listenhere Denver PSL organizer Ryan speaks on the Leaflets podcast about the arrests of anti-racist protestors in Denver and the campaign to get their charges dropped. Leaflets is on Tiktok, Twitter, Instagram, Youtube, and Patreon, and it is an educational video channel committed to leftist education and awakening the working class.

https://leaflets.libsyn.com/7-the-state-cracks-down

In this episode, we talk to a Denver Party for Socialism and Liberation organizer who details the events that led up to and followed the September 17 state crackdown on peaceful protests in Denver, CO. To learn more about ways you can help the organizers who were unjustly arrested and charged with a...

item.title: Denver organizers Joel Ibrahim and Lillian House speak with Sean...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Denver organizers Joel Ibrahim and Lillian House speak with Sean Blackmon and Jacquie Luqman of By Any Means Necessary on how they and other anti-racist leaders were recently arrested, detained and now face heavy felony charges for leading large, non-violent protests for Elijah McClain.

#DropTheChargesCO

item.title: Party for Socialism and Liberation - DenverDenver Homeless Out LoudSNOW is coming...Winter Gear Needed on FRIDAY Call out for winter gear!!...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - DenverDenver Homeless Out Loud

SNOW is coming...Winter Gear Needed on FRIDAY

Call out for winter gear!! It is gonna be freezing cold and snow on Sunday and Monday. With all the sweeps lately ...many people have lost their gear and have nothing. Proper gear can be a matter of life and death.
Please donate the following to our office ON FRIDAY (10/23) anytime between 9am and 5pm. We will not be in the office on Saturday so please bring it by Friday so it can get to people in need.
(Or give it directly to someone in need.)
-Tents ($25)*
-Tarps ($6)
-Sleeping Bags ($30)
-Blankets ($20)
-Handwarmers ($6)
-Good gloves ($15)

*All prices listed are average price at Walmart. Also you can get these at a thrift store for cheep.

(We do not have storage capacity for clothes, so please only bring winter gear...not lots of clothes - other places will take clothes).

Bring items to the DHOL office (2260 California St Denver CO) THIS Friday 9am to 5pm
Feel free to call us at 720-940-5291
Or give items directly to people on the streets who need these things

Living without a house in the winter requires this protection. Your gifts of gear save people's lives.

Contact:
info@denverhomelessoutloud.org
720-940-5291

See More

item.title: “We’ve recovered our democracy”: Bolivian coup regime...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

“We’ve recovered our democracy”: Bolivian coup regime humiliated as socialist wins landslide election

The Bolivian people stood up to vote for sovereignty and regain their democracy. This is a humiliating blow to the far-right regime of coup-installed president Jeanine Áñez and is being celebrated by the left across Latin America. #Bolivia #coup #latinamerica

item.title: Listen to the Unauthorized Disclosure interview with Lillian...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Listen to the Unauthorized Disclosure interview with Lillian House, targeted anti-racist organizer in Denver.

Hosts Rania Khalek and Kevin Gosztola are joined by Lillian, who is one of the Denver organizers targeted in militarized police raids and charged with political offenses for their involvement in anti-racist protests in Colorado sparked by the death of Elijah McClain, who was killed by Aurora police.

She, Joel Northam, and Eliza Lucero, all organizers with the PSL, we...re held for over a week in jail in conditions she describes as unsafe and inhumane.

A district attorney has charged the activists with "felony charges of kidnapping and rioting," as well as misdemeanors like "disturbing the peace."

#DropTheChargesCO

See MoreOfficial Post from Rania Khalek and Kevin Gosztola

patreon.com

item.title: DROP ALL THE CHARGES ON ANTI-RACIST ORGANIZERS IN THE DENVER...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

DROP ALL THE CHARGES ON ANTI-RACIST ORGANIZERS IN THE DENVER AREA! - HOW YOU CAN HELP

On Sept. 17, police agencies in the Denver area arrested anti-racist organizers in a coordinated assault. People were arrested in a Home Depot parking lot, at their homes, and after they were pulled over while driving. Those arrested were the leaders to demand justice for Elijah McClain, who was brutally murdered by the Aurora Police Department. They are still in jail, with the exception of ...one person. They are facing multiple felony charges and years in prison in an obvious frame-up aimed at stopping the movement for justice for Elijah McClain.

Add your name to sign the petition and join the campaign to demand that all the charges be dropped!

Petition text:

"I demand that all charges be dropped on anti-racist organizers in the Denver area. It is an obvious political frame-up aimed at stopping the movement for justice for Elijah McClain."

You can also donate for legal and political support for the PSL organizers who were arrested: pslweb.org/donate4denver

If you are a community leader or a member of an organization you can sign our solidarity statement: pslweb.org/denverorgsolidarity

If you can support in person, you can join our emergency demonstration demanding the dropping off all charges: https://facebook.com/events/s/dropthechargesco-march-and-ral/775179416359489/?ti=icl

See MoreOn Sept. 17, police agencies in the Denver area arrested anti-racist organizers in a coordinated assault.
